section.name: Introduction
section.p: Avalon is a Server Framework that provides or will provide for central administration, server pooling, and quicker time to market. The framework defines a standard method of piecing together server components and creating a server.

s2.title: Target Audience
s2.p: This documentation will describe the care and feeding of the Avalon Phoenix kernel from the point of view of the administrator.

s2.title: Guide non-existent, but features are there
s2.p: We currently have no info on this whatsoever. However, this doesn't mean that Phoenix is not easy to administrate - the contrary is true, since our tight integration with JMX exposes the entire kernel at runtime.
